titles.title: Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act

A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations to the Department of Veterans Affairs for purposes of awarding grants to veterans service organizations for the transportation of highly rural veterans.
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran with an amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 413.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendment as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Highly Rural Veteran Transportation Program Extension Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2021 a grant program to provide innovative transportation options to veterans in highly rural areas.
